## Path4 type

Type checked lookup path (depth 4)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Path4<T, A, B, C, D> = A extends Keys<T> ? B extends Keys1<T, A> ? C extends Keys2<T, A, B> ? D extends Keys3<T, A, B, C> ? readonly [A, B, C, D] : never : never : never : never;
```
